Text.val: 27.08.2014 AS SCR#19068 Removed references to CV1
08.08.2014 AS SCR#19062, removed support for GSET(7002)<>'Y'. Only PDF from FOP is supported (no RTF templates anymore)
28.08.2014 AS SCR#19110 changed Requester I/O to UTF-8
check if display of information is allowed for client user ...

ExpSyntax.val: '(STIC_SCHT_ADMNO, STIC_SCHT_CLNTNO) IN (select CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED,CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/CFLC where CFLC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({0,4},''))&' AND CFLC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({0,5},''))&' AND CFLC_USRID='''&Trim ({0,6})&''')'

Text.val: Check if user is allowed to see document specified in ARCH record ....
Get random string to build a secure filename ....
Copy generated PDF to webserver Filesystem
user not allowed to see document from ARCH record ....
